features: 🎁🎮🌺🌸【 8G LARGE MEMORY】Built-in 8GB memory to store more of your favorite game photos and videos (you can also change a larger memory card)

🎁🎮🌺🌸【FREE 10500 GAMES】 Built-in 6800+ classic games. Homepage shortcut 12 classic games! There are 10,000 games in the folder, and 500+ games in the external folder. Of course, you can also download games in related formats. Support arcade games / Famicom (FC, SFC) / Gameboy (GBA, GBC) / Megadrive (MD)
🎁🎮🌺🌸【VERSATILE CONSOLE】 Not only a Game Console but also Music Player, Video Player, E-book, Stopwatch, Calculator.It can connect to PC with USB cable, supported Win2000/Vista/XP/Win7/Win8/Win10

🎁🎮🌺🌸【5.1-INCH LARGE SCREEN】 Large full-color TFT LCD screen, double protection, no eye damage for a long time. It has anti-scratch and anti-drop functions, bringing exciting gaming experience and better eye protection.-scratch and anti-drop functions, bringing exciting gaming experience and better eye protection.

🎁🎮🌺🌸【 LONG STANDBY TIME】 Built-in 1500mAh high capacity lithium battery for ultra-long standby time and battery life. Support up to 5 hours game playing and 50 hours music playing. Brings lots of joy and happiness to you during a trip or a long journey.
body.description: Dear: Please refer to the following information carefully Note: Please contact us in time if it cannot be turned on or damaged, we are very willing to serve you! Can apply for return and exchange, thank you very much *Games are important: Since our game consoles have many game items built in, we cannot list all the game content, but we have included the most popular game items! *Of course, if you don’t like our built-in games, you can delete them or keep them in the game folder. *Importantly, you can connect to your computer via USB, search for your favorite games online and download them on the game console. Features: ** Multiple supported music, photo and video formats. ** Screen size: 5.1 inches full color TFT screen ** Memory: Built-in 8GB, support TF card expansion, maximum expansion 16GB/32GB (maximum) ** Operation: Button/Joystick ** Can be connected to TV (TV interface) ** Games can be archived Specification: Material: plastic + electronic components Color: red, blue, yellow, red-blue, red-yellow Screen: 5.1 inches Size: 195x85x15mm Battery: Built-in 1000 mAh battery Charging time: 1-2 hours Play time: 2-5 hours Signal to noise ratio: 90db. Connection port: MINI 5P USB/3.5mm AUX headphone output/TV output, Simulator: Support eight game simulators (cps, neogeo, gba, sfc, md, fc, gb, gbc) Support AV TV output support 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit Support music formats: MP3, WMA, OGG, WAV, AAC, APE Support video formats: RM, RMVB, AVI, MP4, 3GP E-book format support: TXT Multi-function: game+music+video+photography+ebook+recording Support languages: 18 languages ​​(you can select the correct language in the settings) Packing list: -Game console x 1 -Cable x 1 -Instruction manual x 1 -Headphone x 1 -Chinese and English manual x 1 I wish you a happy shopping, THX

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It's not terrible, but I don't recommend this gaming device
reviews.reviewText: There are some things to like about this device and a lot not to. The first one I received had a screen that flickered on and off making it unusable, but the second one I received was fine. I recommend spending a little more for a higher-quality device.Pros:- It does play games.- You will find some enjoyment playing the games.- It has some popular classic games already installed (more on that in the cons, though).Cons:- This plays mostly older games, so the 16:9 aspect ratio doesn't make sense. By default, it stretches 4:3 games, but you can set it to have bright white bars on the side instead. Neither are ideal.- It looks cheap and feels cheap (you get what you pay for).- The screen is just OK. The colors are not accurate and the contrast is poor, but it is usable.- The navigation is a mess. You have a few games on the main page, but most games are found by scrolling through a menu.- It really only comes with just over 1,100 games. These games are then repeated 10 times to make it look like there are 11,000. I'm not kidding. It's ridiculous.- Many games are not in English.- Some games are homebrew/hacks.- While I found some of my favorite retro NES games pre-installed (like Tetris), a lot of the big hits like Super Mario Bros are missing.- Battery life is just OK.- Controls are squishy. They work, but you'll wish they were better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this great console for kids to play many games. Excellent quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice portable console for kids
reviews.reviewText: This handheld console i nice because it has a ton of different games to choose from. However not all the games are easily played. I have run in to several so far that despite all the console settings being set to English, the games dialogues and directions are still displayed in a foreign language and cannot be changed. This makes it difficult for my kids and myself to fully enjoy playing as we have a hard time figuring out how to play and cannot follow along any of the story lines.Despite the language barrier in some games the others are easy to figure out and are in English. The console does not seem to save any of the game progress as it would make you believe, so any time the game is closed it will have to be started over from the beginning.Overall it was still a good find as its perfect to keep my kids occupied and is small, lightweight, and rechargeable so it can easily go in the car and on any longer trips.
